school_management module

class school_management.Course(course_id, course_name)[source]

Bases: object

defines a course

Parameters:

  • course_id (str) – Unique course identifier

  • course_name (str) – Name of the course

add_student(student)[source]

Adds a student to the enrolled students list if not already present.

Parameters:

student (Student) – Student object to add

class school_management.Instructor(name, age, email, instructor_id)[source]

Bases: Person

Represents an instructor, inheriting from Person.

Parameters:

  • name (str) – Name of the instructor

  • age (int) – Age of the instructor

  • email (str) – Email of the instructor

  • instructor_id (str) – Unique instructor identifier

assign_course(course)[source]

Assigns a course to the instructor and sets the instructor of the course.

Parameters:

course (Course) – Course object to assign

Bases: object

defines a person

  • age (int) – age of person

  • email (str) – email of person

school_management.load_data(filename)[source]

Loads students, instructors, and courses data from a JSON file.

Parameters:

filename (str) – Path to the input JSON file

Returns:

Tuple of lists (students, instructors, courses)

Return type:

tuple[list[Student], list[Instructor], list[Course]]

school_management.save_data(filename, students, instructors, courses)[source]

Saves students, instructors, and courses data into a JSON file.

Parameters:

  • filename (str) – Path to the output JSON file

  • students (list[Student]) – List of Student objects

  • instructors (list[Instructor]) – List of Instructor objects

  • courses (list[Course]) – List of Course objects
